entity.name: Day 4
entity.description: Eilidh Barbour introduces live final-round coverage of the 83rd Masters from Augusta, with the famous green jacket tantalisingly close for those near the top of the leaderboard. In 2018 it was American Patrick Reed who kept his nerve to protect an overnight lead, while the previous year saw a thrilling play-off between fellow Europeans Sergio Garcia and Justin Rose, with Spaniard Garcia ultimately prevailing to claim his first Masters title.
